EmailTemplate.name: CR 9.4 Expense Payment Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your expense claim: payment notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c}. Dear {!Expenses__c.Contact_Name__c},
Thank you for submitting an expense claim for your work on the NCS programme. Your approved expense(s) for {!Expenses__c.Wave__c} will be paid into your account within the next 7 working days.
To check which of your expense claims have been approved, and the total sum you should have received, please refer to your 'Summary of submitted expenses' email.
If you do not receive this payment within 7 days, please contact your staffing associate as soon as possible.
Best wishes,
The Challenge Staffing Team VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
